'''Imuani''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|This grizzled old aumaua woman looks like she's been left in the sun to dry. Her skin is so worn and weathered, it's hard to tell her wrinkles from her scars.}}

Imuani sells only the finest armor and weapons, tested on the denizens of The Gullet.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Weapons, armor. Sells the unique [Rekvu's Fractured Casque](/rekvusFracturedCasque/) and [The Undying Burden](/theUndyingBurden/).
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [The Man of Chimes](/theManOfChimes/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [The Man of Chimes](/theManOfChimes/): Imuani witnessed the scuffle between the animancer [Giacolo](/giacolo/) and the group of godlike pirates. Though Giacolo put up a good fight, they eventually subdued him and took him off towards [The Undercroft](/theUndercroft/).
[Category:The Gullet characters](/categoryTheGulletCharacters/)
[Category:Delver's Row characters](/categoryDelversRowCharacters/)

'''Imuani''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
{{Description|This grizzled old aumaua woman looks like she's been left in the sun to dry. Her skin is so worn and weathered, it's hard to tell her wrinkles from her scars.}}

Imuani sells only the finest armor and weapons, tested on the denizens of The Gullet.

==Interactions==
{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Weapons, armor. Sells the unique [[Rekvu's Fractured Casque]] and [[The Undying Burden]].
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [[The Man of Chimes]]

}}

===Quests===
* [[The Man of Chimes]]: Imuani witnessed the scuffle between the animancer [[Giacolo]] and the group of godlike pirates. Though Giacolo put up a good fight, they eventually subdued him and took him off towards [[The Undercroft]].
